oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A robust recursive least squares algorithm
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHANSARKAR, MM
DESAI, UB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: adaptive equalization
error propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new algorithm is developed, which guarantees the normalized bias in the weight vector due to persistent and bounded data perturbations to be bounded, Robustness analysis for this algorithm has been presented, An approximate recursive implementation is also proposed. It is termed as the robust recursive least squares (RRLS) algorithm since it resembles the RLS: algorithm in its structure and is robust with respect to persistent hounded data perturbation. Simulation results are presented to illustrate the efficacy of the RRLS algorithm.
